struct  OutputSpike

Detailed Description

Class for communicate output spikes in a output file.

This class abstract methods for communicate the output spikes to the TCPIP device.

Author:
Jesus Garrido

Richard Carrillo

Date:
August 2008

Member Function Documentation

void TCPIPOutputSpikeDriver::WriteSpike ( const Spike *  NewSpike  )  throw (EDLUTException) [virtual]

It adds the spike to the buffer.

This method introduces the output spikes to the output buffer. If the object isn't buffered, then the spike will be automatically sent.

Parameters:
NewSpike The spike for send.
See also:
FlushBuffers()
Exceptions:
EDLUTException If something wrong happens in the output process.
